name: 马利·布莱克
introduction: Mari Blake (she/her) is an actor, writer, and artist based in NYC. She began her acting career at age 5 and has continued to perform since then, studying acting at Elon University (BFA), Stella Adler Studio of Acting, and The Barrow Group.Recent theatre credits include Shadows (Off-Broadway, Gural Theatre NYC), The Star-Spangled Girl (Judson Theatre Company, NC), A Midsummer Night's Dream (Nash Studios, NYC), Three Sisters (The Box, NYC). Mari also enjoys acting on camera and has several films anticipating festival runs in 2023.She has a knack for learning accents and is SAFD certified in single-sword stage combat. Mari is seeking an agent. Going forward, she hopes to continue storytelling through any avenue which makes itself available!
